about_the_game:
Game introduction

"paranormal power" is a 2D Chinese folk fantasy style adventure storyline game. The player will play the role of a Taoist disciple who goes down the mountain to experience, but unexpectedly stumbles into a dangerous county town. In the city, players will pick up the peach wood sword and dust in their hands, collect resources to create talisman and fight various demons and monsters, explore various secrets in the county town, interact with the people in the county town, and change the direction of the story.

The main gameplay and content of the game

Regional exploration
Make Fulu subdued demons
Multi-branch and multi-fining plot

Game Positioning

Based on the traditional Chinese novel "Zi Bu Yan", the game is a light RPG with a plot exploration.
The game has multiple plot branches and multiple endings

Developer's Thoughts

This game was made by me alone, As a recent college graduate.with limited abilities and time and energy.
In my mind there is a picture of this game, and now I expect to have completed 30% of the picture in my mind.
This has taken me months of work, but I expect to be able to do it faster and faster, and I'm aiming to finish it within this year!
Special thanks to the players who were able to add to the wish list, your support is my greatest encouragement!
If you have any ideas about the game or would like to give feedback on bugs you can comment
(*^_^*)
